Method Detail

getSchedule

EmailCampaignSchedule getSchedule(String accessToken,
                                  String campaignId,
                                  String scheduleId)
                                  throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the get Schedule operation of the Email Campaign Schedule API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
campaignId - The id of the email campaign
scheduleId - The id of the schedule
Returns:
The Email Campaign Schedule containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

scheduleId - The id of the schedule
emailCampaignSchedule - The Email Campaign Schedule to update
Returns:
The Email Campaign Schedule containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.

ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

                       String campaignId,
                       String scheduleId)
                       throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the delete Schedule operation of the Email Campaign Schedule API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
campaignId - The id of the email campaign
scheduleId - The id of the schedule
Returns:
true when deleted with success; an exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

getSchedules

List<EmailCampaignSchedule> getSchedules(String accessToken,
                                         String campaignId)
                                         throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the get Schedules (ALL schedules in a campaign) operation of the Email Campaign Schedule API by calling the ConstantContact server side. Get all Schedules based on campaignId.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
campaignId - The id of the email campaign
Returns:
A List of EmailCampaignSchedule containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

                                  throws ConstantContactServiceException

Parameters:

campaignId - The id of the email campaign
emailCampaignSchedule - The Email Campaign Schedule to add
Returns:
The Email Campaign Schedule containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.
